div.label: English
div.div: Add a one-line explanation of what this file represents

td.div: English: Flag of Nova Scotia, Canada.
Français : Drapeau de la Nouvelle-Écosse, Canada.

table.style: width: 100%; clear: both; margin: 0.5em auto; background-color: var(--background-color-progressive-subtle, #f7f8ff); color: var(--color-base, #202122); border: var(--border-subtle, 2px solid #8888aa); border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

td.p: This work is in the public domain in its country of origin and other countries and areas where the copyright term is the author's life plus 70 years or fewer.
This work is in the public domain in the United States because it was published (or registered with the U.S. Copyright Office) before January 1, 1930.

td.a: This file has been identified as being free of known restrictions under copyright law, including all related and neighboring rights.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:var(--background-color-neutral-subtle,#f7f8ff); border:2px solid #8888aa;color: inherit;

tr.td: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:48, 1 August 2022

tr.td: Uploaded a work by Original by User:Ec.Domnowall from File:Bratach Alba Nuaidh.svg Flag of Nova Scotia.svg with UploadWizard

This file contains additional information such as Exif metadata which may have been added by the digital camera, scanner, or software program used to create or digitize it. If the file has been modified from its original state, some details such as the timestamp may not fully reflect those of the original file. The timestamp is only as accurate as the clock in the camera, and it may be completely wrong.
